name: penjadwalan-app
description: Aplikasi Manajemen Jadwal Kegiatan - UAS Pemrograman Web
author: Tio Afriza & Yales Vepa

scripts.docs: echo 'Opening documentation...' && (open docs/INDEX.md || xdg-open docs/INDEX.md || start docs/INDEX.md)
scripts.docs:serve: echo 'Documentation available at: docs/' && (ls -la docs/ || dir docs)
scripts.docs:windows: echo 'Documentation available at: docs/' && dir docs
scripts.setup:windows: echo 'Windows setup guide: docs/PANDUAN_WINDOWS.md' && type docs\PANDUAN_WINDOWS.md
